meanings.definition: Not capable of being proven false.
meanings.sent1: The theory was unfalsifiable, meaning it could not be proven wrong.
meanings.sent2: The scientist proposed an unfalsifiable hypothesis that could not be disproven.
meanings.sent3: It's like trying to argue with a rock - completely unfalsifiable!
meanings.sent4: Her belief in magic was as unfalsifiable as a dream that never fades.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel was so unfalsifiable that it boggled the mind.

meanings.sent1: The claim was unfalsifiable, making it impossible to disprove.
meanings.sent2: His unfalsifiable statement left everyone puzzled as no one could prove it wrong.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking unicorn was so unfalsifiable that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as unfalsifiable as the sun rising every morning.
meanings.sent5: The mystery surrounding the old house was unfalsifiable, shrouded in secrets.
